EmailTemplate.description: Email notification sent to the breach owner on the 6th day. 5 day (excluding Sat & Sun) countdown to start from date indicated in 'Breach Owner Allocation Date' field
EmailTemplate.name: 5 days with BO WIP Office stage email notification
EmailTemplate.subject: ****BREACH PASSED ITS 5 DAYS DEADLINE*** | Breach Stage: {!Breach__c.Breach_Stage__c} | ATM ID - {!Breach__c.Name}
